name: Celestial Drift
description: Subtle star-like highlights create a sense of cosmic expansiveness.

name: Crimson Echo
description: Bold strokes conveying energy and movement across a dynamic canvas.

name: Twilight Veil
description: A moody landscape capturing the fleeting moments of dusk.

name: Golden Drift
description: Warm, flowing colors that suggest serenity and subtle motion.

name: Silent Horizon
description: Minimalist approach emphasizing space and quiet tension.

name: Emerald Cascade
description: Vivid greens cascading with fluid textures and depth.

name: Frosted Reverie
description: Cool tones evoking the quiet stillness of winter landscapes.

name: Amber Veins
description: Organic patterns resembling veins of light through stone.

name: Luminous Drift
description: Soft radiance and flowing gradients create an ethereal mood.

name: Obsidian Pulse
description: Dark, intense contrasts explore rhythm and depth in abstraction.
